abstract: Texts have become so ingrained that apps have borrowed the chat format for storytelling, news or gaming.
snippet: Texts have become so ingrained that apps have borrowed the chat format for storytelling, news or gaming.
lead_paragraph: WHETHER it’s by iMessage, WhatsApp, Snapchat, or Facebook’s Messenger or Instagram, we collectively send billions of text messages daily. This fast-paced method of communication has become so ingrained that other apps have borrowed the chat format for different purposes.

headline.main: Text Messaging Takes More Apps Into a Chattier Realm
headline.print_headline: Text Format Takes Apps Into Chattier Realm
